content: the tailgate beanie crochet pattern uses a tightly woven stitch called herringbone half_double_crochet it creates a thick and solid piece of fabric you can easily customize this beanie to show off your favorite team materials 100g worsted weight acrylic or cotton yarn in 2 colors i used i love this yarn in red & light taupe i/5 5 mm hook yarn needle scissors approx finished size large adult circumference 22 height 9
